artist: Designer: Tanja Orsjoki; Manufacturer: Vallila Interior
creditline: Gift of Vallila Interior, Helsinki - Finland
description: silhouettes of bare trees in black over purples and white
markings: attached to long side with plastic: manufacturer\'s paper tag
signed: along one long side, printed (repeating) in black: [VALLILA INTERIOR  \"Kelohonka\"  Tanja Orsjoki  2008]
text: This barren scene is among the most popular motifs created by fabric design house Vallila. The fabric is available in a variety of vibrant background colors, such as the violet shown here. In Finland, nature is never far away, even in the cities. And this pattern, suitable for curtains, pillow covers, and wall hangings, helps bring nature into the home.
title: Kelohonka
